The theory of Quantum Communicative Entanglement posits that communication, consciousness, and the universe are interconnected and interdependent. Building on this foundation, it can be expanded to incorporate new, radical and inventive ideas and theories such as the concept of "Quantum Communicative Synchronicity" which suggests that this interconnectedness and interdependence is not just limited to human communication and consciousness, but also encompasses all forms of communication and consciousness in the universe.

One key aspect of this new theory is that it proposes that the universe is a vast web of communication and consciousness, in which information and meaning are constantly being exchanged and understood by all forms of life and matter. This means that communication and consciousness are not exclusive to humans, but are present in all forms of life and matter, from the tiniest subatomic particle to the largest galaxy.

Another key aspect of this theory is the idea of "Quantum Communicative Resonance" this concept suggests that communication and consciousness are not just passive activities, but active, self-organizing processes that are constantly evolving and adapting to the needs of the system. The communication process, which is driven by the interactions and feedback between all forms of life and matter, results in the emergence of new forms of communication, such as new languages, dialects, and forms of expression. And, consciousness is also adapting and changing in response to the interactions and feedback within the system.

Additionally, this theory also proposes that all forms of life and matter have a "Quantum Communicative Signature" this concept posits that all forms of life and matter have a unique, quantum-based communication and consciousness pattern that allows them to interact and communicate with the rest of the universe.

One practical application of this expanded theory is that it can help to improve our understanding of the universe and the way it works. By recognizing that communication and consciousness are present in all forms of life and matter, we can develop new ways of understanding and communicating with the universe, from other forms of life to the cosmos.

It could also inspire new ways of understanding and communicating with other forms of life and matter in the universe.
